title: Game-Based Self-Regulated Learning Course for Enhancing Artificial Intelligence Applications and Computational Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational computing concepts, no programming experience
context.additional_context: Optimizing smartphone-based learning environments for pre-service/in-service teachers, with a focus on formative assessment-driven operations

learning_goals: Learners can explain ≥80% of AI application cases through game-based simulations.
Learners can design ≥3 stages of computational thinking problem-solving processes using self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can apply ≥70% of feedback routines that assess and improve logical thinking skills related to AI technology.
Learners can identify ≥3 ethical issues arising from AI use and propose solutions.

resources: AI 2 Robot City Mobile Game App
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
